text:
Question 18) Memory carrier, the landscape helps build the feelings of belonging; It creates an atmosphere that suits the strong moments of life, parties, celebrations.
In the text, a form of integration of the geographical landscape with social life is presented. In this sense, the landscape, besides existing as a concrete form, has a dimension
A) Effective appropriation policy of space.
B) Economic to use space resources.
C) Private limitation on space use.
D) Natural of composition by physical elements of space.
E) symbolic subjective relationship of the individual to space.
